about me

Hi, I'm Razvan

I build things that don't yet exist.

I'm a maker of things that live on the web to make lives easier for people living in the real world.

I work with a bunch of awesome people at Adobe, on the Web Platform team, teaching CSS new tricks. Find out more about me.

This is where I share some thoughts.
